solution_line_template: Mcdonald has to produce {eggs_needed_by_saly} + {eggs_needed_by_ben} + {eggs_needed_by_ked} = <<{eggs_needed_by_saly}+{eggs_needed_by_ben}+{eggs_needed_by_ked}={total_eggs_per_week}>>{total_eggs_per_week} eggs in a week.
Therefore, Mcdonald's farm has to produce {total_eggs_per_week} x {weeks_in_a_month} = <<{total_eggs_per_week}*{weeks_in_a_month}={total_eggs_per_month}>>{total_eggs_per_month} eggs in a month.
